result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES: 14CF138, 14CF142, 14CF207, 14CM105, 14CM173. Defendant Cody J. Utgard in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 11:38 am.  
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, no body armor, if not US citizen face deporation or potential loss of other civil rights.  Find elig for SA pgm & CIP.  
14CF138-Count 1-w/h sentence-probation 2 yrs, DNA sample/no surcharge.  6 mo CT, banked for probation.
14CF142-w/h sentence, 2 yr probation DNA sample & surcharge, 100 hrs of CS. 
Count 2 of 14CF138-w/h sentence, 1 yr probation.  
ON all-COMPAS, DNA sample. Must report to probation today.  Absolute sobriety, participate/complete required progams of probation.  Find elig for expungement.   11:55 am adj.
Sentencing hearing on November 7, 2014 at 11:00 am.

CASES: 14CF138, 14CF142, 14CF207, 14CM105 & 14CM173.  Defendant Cody J. Utgard in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:01 am.
CT-Cannnot possess firearm, no body armor, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold public office.  Face deportation if not US citizen.  
14CF138-Count 1-Def-guilty.  Count 2-guilty.  14CF142-Count 1-Def-guilty.  CT-guilty pleas received to all 3, adj guilty & judgment entered.  14CF138-count 3-DRI for sentencing.  14CF207, 14CM105 & 14CM173 all DRI for sentencing.  
Order PSI, long form, Compas.  Agent need not be present.  Bonds cont.  10:20 am adj.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 7, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on August 22, 2014 at 09:45 am.

Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.  Defendant shall neither directly or indirectly threaten, harass, intimidate or otherwise interfere with victims or witnesses in this action.

CASES: 14CF207, 14CF138, 14CF142, 14CM105 & 14CM173.  Defendant Cody J. Utgard in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Stephen C Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 3:39 pm.  Waiver of PH in 14CF142 & 14CF138.  CT finds PC & def bound over 14CF142 & 14CF138.  Preserved for 30 days on prearraignment rights.  Information filed as to 14CF142. STom-NG plea, WST.  Information will be filed as to 14CF138.  
14CF207-CT sets bond.  WSPH.  3:48 PM ADJ.  Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2014 at 09:45 am.
